metadata.title: CVE-2024-36845 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid pointer in the modbus_receive() function of libmodbus v3.1.6allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted messagesent to the unit-test-server.

criterions.comment: libmodbus package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
